testCases.name: [KAN-TC-1] Login with invalid credentials
testCases.description: Imported from AIO Tests - Verify that the system properly handles and displays appropriate error messages when a user attempts to log in with incorrect credentials.

testCases.name: [KAN-TC-3] Add 2 products into shopping cart
testCases.description: Imported from AIO Tests - Verify that users can successfully add two products to the shopping cart and that the cart badge reflects the correct count.

testCases.name: [KAN-TC-4] Prihlas sa s prazdnym menom
testCases.description: Imported from AIO Tests - Verify that the system properly handles login with empty username.
